revised_title: A New Lagrangian Approach for Eulerian Fluid Mechanics
tldr: The authors present a new Lagrangian approach for Eulerian fluid mechanics, deriving equations of motion for inviscid non-barotropic fluids that incorporate local conservation of mass, entropy, circulation, and potential vorticity. This approach allows for a more descriptive and well-defined representation of fluid motion, providing a better understanding of the underlying principles and behavior of fluids.
